description.en:
CarLive Chain is a vertical application of blockchain technology in the field of automotive social network . CarLive Chain is committed to building a blockchain value public chain for automotive consumption through the technological revolution. It provides services to the user groups of 1.3 billion vehicles worldwide and the trillion-dollar scale automobile consumer market, completely subverting the traditional centralized operation model, and bringing a brand-new and happy car life experience to users. 

CarLive Chain is going to reconstruct business value system in social contact, e-ecommerce, and online advertisement on the basis of 60 million car users. The achievement of the system solves the problem of credit crisis between car manufacturers, service providers and car users, as well as the user’s behavior data occupation of vehicle Internet from car users. Changes the high consumption circumstance of and ensures the vehicle safety. 

CarLive Chain plans to generate 3 billion TOKEN in 10 years in order to stimulate the users and ecological partners to participate in the application of IOV-Block Chain technology . CarLive Chain will deploy super data nodes globally to serve the automotive life ecosystem.
